Services still up and running: 24-Hour Hotline; Shelter Services; Court Program and Counseling through the Hotline. Services modified re-opening: Outreach Center - go to Outreach Center page for change in hours. Services temporarily
suspended: Support Groups; Jail Program; Teen Program.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cvan.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "PO BOX 1749", "address_2": null, "city": "CONCORD", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28026", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4109398, "longitude": -80.5777935}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 788-1108", "type": "voice"}]}
